 Promotion for prepaid subscribers recharge account in Women's Day 08/03 
 1. Eligible subscribers 
 
 Prepaid subscribers recharge account (active, inactive, deactive, at the time of keeping subscription, in the first 10 top-up). 
 Postpaid subscribers change to prepaid subscribers can join this promotion. 
 
  2.  Benefits 
 
 Up to 50% EXTRA top-up credits. 
 Unlimited times of top-up and value of scratch cards 
 Applicable for every top up during promotion period, as following: 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Top up card 
 
 
 Bonus 
 
 
 
 
 Bonus 2 ( offline) 
 
 
 Bonus 3 (online)

 2012&#45380;3&#50900;&#50640; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;- 2011&#45380;3&#50900;&#50640; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51012; &#50672;&#51109; (trả sau tháng 3) 
 1.  &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; 
 
 
 2011 &#45380; 3 &#50900;&#50640; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; ( &#54876;&#46041; &#51473; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#48156;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46104;&#44144;&#45208; , &#46608;&#45716; &#48156;&#49888; &#48143; &#49688;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46104;&#50612;&#49436; &#48373;&#44396;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; ). 
 
 
 &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46104;&#45716; &#48276;&#50948; : 
 
 
 VNPT &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016; &#48143;&#49352; &#44032;&#51077;&#54620; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54616;&#45912; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; . 
 
 
 &#50629;&#47924;&#50857; &#48264;&#54840; / &#44277;&#47924; &#50857; &#48264;&#54840; / &#53580;&#49828;&#53944; &#49900; &#52852;&#46300; / &#51076;&#45824; &#48264;&#54840; / &#45236;&#48512; &#48264;&#54840; 
 
 
 2011 &#45380; 4 &#50900; /5 &#50900;&#50640; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;. 
 
 
 
 
 2. &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496;  &#45236;&#50857;

 (voice call)

 &#54620; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640;&#45716; &#47924;&#47308; &#52509;&#44592;&#44036;&#51060; 1500 &#48516;&#51060;&#45796; . 
 601 &#52488;&#48512;&#53552; &#46608;&#45716; &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46108; &#48276;&#50948;&#50640; &#53685;&#54868;&#54616;&#47732; : &#54788;&#54665; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#51201;&#50857;&#46104;&#44256; 1 &#52488;&#45817; &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#48512;&#44284;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 
 
 &#52712;&#49548; 
 
 HUY_VNPT &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#51089;&#49457;&#54616;&#50668; 999 &#48264;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45236;&#44592; . 
 - &#45796;&#51020; &#51452;&#44592;&#48512;&#53552; &#52712;&#49548;&#44032; &#51201;&#50857;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 - &#52712;&#49548;&#54616;&#47732; &#45796;&#49884; &#46321;&#47197;&#51060; &#48520;&#44032;&#45733;&#54633;&#45768;&#45796; . &#54788;&#45824; &#51452;&#44592; &#47564;&#44592;&#44620;&#51648; &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#48512;&#44284;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 &#51089;&#45380;&#50640; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#46308; : &#51089;&#45380; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51060; &#45149;&#45208;&#51088;&#47560;&#51088; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51060; &#49352;&#47196;&#50868; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#46321;&#47197;&#54616;&#47732; &#46321;&#47197;&#54620; &#45216;&#51676;&#48512;&#53552; 2012 &#45380; 6 &#50900; 30 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#49352;&#47196;&#50868; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#44192;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#44552;&#50529;&#51060; &#48512;&#44032;&#44032;&#52824;&#49464;&#47484; &#54252;&#54632;&#46104;&#50632;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 &#54788;&#54665; &#46972;&#50868;&#46377; &#44508;&#52825;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#51201;&#50857;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 (Pick time) &#54588;&#53356;&#53440;&#51076; ( &#48148;&#49244; &#49884;&#44036; ) &#44536;&#47532;&#44256; (Off pick time) &#48148;&#49240;&#51648; &#50506;&#51008; &#49884;&#44036;&#45824;&#50640;&#45716; &#45796; &#51201;&#50857;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 &#51060; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51060; &#50724;&#47004; &#50672;&#44208; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#52629;&#51201;&#51216;&#51004;&#47196; &#48512;&#44284; &#50504; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 &#44256;&#44061;&#51060; &#51060; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#44284; &#45796;&#47480; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#46041;&#49884; &#52280;&#50668;&#54616;&#47732; &#51060;&#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#47676;&#51200; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#51077;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#48155;&#44256; &#51080;&#45716; &#44592;&#44036;&#50504;&#50640; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51060; &#51060; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#51060;&#50976;&#46412;&#47928;&#50640; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#47484; &#52712;&#49548;&#54616;&#47140;&#47732; &#48708;&#50857;&#51060; &#49892;&#51228; &#49324;&#50857;&#54620; &#51068;&#49688;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#48512;&#44284;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; (1 &#48264;&#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016; : 25000 &#46041; / &#51452;&#44592; ; 2 &#48264;&#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016; : 129000 &#46041; / &#51452;&#44592; ) 
 
 
 &#49440;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47196; &#48148;&#44984;&#47140;&#45716; &#44221;&#50864; 
 
 
 &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49325;&#51228; 
 
 
 &#44228;&#50557;&#51088; &#48320;&#44221; 
 
 
 
 
 &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#48155;&#44256; &#51080;&#45716; &#44592;&#44036;&#50504;&#50640; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#48156;&#49888; &#48143; &#49688;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46104;&#50612;&#49436; &#45796;&#49884; &#48373;&#44396;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#51060; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; 2012 &#45380; 6 &#50900; 30 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796; . 
 
 
 &#44256;&#44061;&#51060; &#51060; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#44284; &#45796;&#47480; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#46041;&#49884; &#52280;&#50668;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . &#45796;&#47480; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#53945;&#48324;&#54620; &#44508;&#51221;&#51060; ( &#45796;&#47480; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#44032;&#45733;&#54620; &#45236;&#50857; ) &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; ). 
 
 
 &#51089;&#45380; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#44256;&#44061;&#51060; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51012; &#50672;&#51109; &#50504; &#54616;&#47732; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51008; &#45149;&#45216; &#44163;&#51077;&#45768;&#45796; .
